ActCanadian Human Rights Act
PrecisAppointment of SHIRISH P. CHOTALIA, Q.C., of Edmonton, Alberta, to be Chairperson of the Canadian Human Rights Tribunal to hold office during good behaviour for a term of seven years, effective November 2, 2009.
